p: In temperate and subtropical climates, malaria transmission in large cities is not an exception. In recent decades, it has been repeatedly documented in New York [ 16], Houston [ 17], etc. As for Russia, there was an outbreak in Nizhny Novgorod in 1998 [ 18], Perm between 1998 and 2003 [ 19], Moscow between 1972 and 1973 and in 1981, and the largest outbreak was between 1999 and 2009 [ 20].
